sentence.Network_en: The Internal Revenue Service sought to disallow the payments.
sentence.Network_cn: 国内收入署试图驳回这些缴纳款。

sentence.Network_en: The policy adopted in this book is to disallow Leibnizian notation within the text.
sentence.Network_cn: 本书采用的办法是在正文中不用莱布尼兹记号.

sentence.Network_en: Never hit a kid and disallow his ability to cry.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要打小孩,又阻止他哭.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词常见词缀词根表_百度文库 ... dis- ? 否，离，安全/ ? disallow 不准， disroot 根除，.
外贸英语_百度文库 ... disagreement n. 不和，不一致 disallow v. 不允许 disappear v. 失踪，消失.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞... ... disagreeableness 不愉快 disallow 拒绝承认 disappearance of conditional reflex 条件反射的消失.
以w结尾的英语英文单词 ... daw 穴鸟 disallow 不许,不准,驳回 disavow 否认,否定,抵赖.

list.abs: disallowance剔除，不准列支disallowed expense不准列支的费用disbursement支付

足球英语必备 - 豆丁网 ... 从门柱弹回： deflect 射中无效： goal disallowed 近射： close-range.
addition , Process Lasso offers capabilities such as default process priorities , termination of disallowed processes , and logging of processes executed .此外，流程拉索提供能力，如违约过程优先，终止批准程序，采伐程序执行。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'disown, refuse to accept'): from Old French desalouer

entry.def: If something is disallowed, it is not allowed or accepted officially, because it has not been done correctly.

example.ex: England scored again, but the whistle had gone and the goal was disallowed...
example.tran: 英格兰又进一球，但哨声已响，进球无效。

example.ex: The Internal Revenue Service sought to disallow the payments...
example.tran: 国内收入署试图驳回这些缴纳款。

sentences.sentence: "I forbid you to call me late at night"
"Mother vetoed the trip to the chocolate store"

auth_sentence.content: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.

auth_sentence.content: It would essentially disallow the biblical account.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would essentially disallow the biblical account.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would essentially disallow the biblical account.

auth_sentence.content: I love the creationists discussion mostly because the "state" wants to disallow its discussion in young minds.
